channel.title: The bored Thread
channel.description:
This thread is about posting what's going through your mind while you're bored. right know im thinking on getting up and grabbing a chocolate from my pantry what are you thinking.
Oh and also dunno if this has been done b4 :o

item.title: The bored Thread
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“r0ckstar96, post:30, topic:382323”]Well, sometimes I’ll just sit there and start humming. A few times when I’m really bored I’ll start thinking and I’ll be thinking so much to the point where my brain is literally just overloaded with thoughts that I didn’t even think of and so I’ll have to just lay there and wait for the thoughts to leave. Sometimes when I’m bored I see and hear things that aren’t really there. Sometimes when I’m bored I try to keep myself unbored by listening to music.
[size=4pt][shadow=red,left]I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy.[/shadow][/size]
:|[/quote]
Your not at all crazy.

I’m crazy, and I love cheesecake, who else?

@Topic: Basically this thread is for spamming.
xD

Read full topic

item.title: The bored Thread

item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Well, sometimes I’ll just sit there and start humming. A few times when I’m really bored I’ll start thinking and I’ll be thinking so much to the point where my brain is literally just overloaded with thoughts that I didn’t even think of and so I’ll have to just lay there and wait for the thoughts to leave. Sometimes when I’m bored I see and hear things that aren’t really there. Sometimes when I’m bored I try to keep myself unbored by listening to music.
[size=4pt][shadow=red,left]I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy. I’m not crazy.[/shadow][/size]
